arts.ttl: Official: Villarreal announce deal for Inter Milan star
arts.sum: La Liga outfit Villarreal have on Saturday have announced a fresh addition to the club’s first-team ranks. The player to have put pen to paper on terms with Marcelino’s side?…

Inter Milan have officially announced the loan transfer of Tajon Buchanan to Villarreal. The 25-year-old Canadian winger will join the Spanish club on a temporary loan until the end of the 2024-25 season, with Villarreal holding an option to make the transfer permanent. The post OFFICIAL: Tajon Buchanan Joins Villarreal appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Villarreal shirt sale fetes Álex Baena for rejecting Al Ahli
arts.sum: Villarreal are so pleased with Álex Baena's decision to remain at the club that they have offered to temporarily print for free the player's name on the back of the club's jerseys that fans buy. "In the end he decided he was not leaving, that he was staying at his club, in Villarreal.

arts.ttl: Preview: Villarreal vs. Real Valladolid - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's La Liga clash between Villarreal and Real Valladolid, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
